home.name: Alessio Vito D'Angelo
home.tagline: Turning complex challenges into elegant solutions

description.intro: Passionate developer focused on backend development, DevOps, and cybersecurity. My technical training combines with a security-first mindset to create robust and secure solutions.
description.journey: My journey began with a passion for programming and evolved through participation in CyberChallenge 2022, where I deepened my cybersecurity skills that I now integrate into every project.
description.philosophy: I believe that security is not optional but a responsibility. Every line of code I write takes into account scalability, maintainability, and data protection.

education.title: Education
education.description: Technical education path with focus on programming and cybersecurity, enriched by participation in CyberChallenge.

passion.title: Passions
passion.description: Backend development, DevOps automation, and security research. Always looking for new technologies and best practices.

approach.title: Approach
approach.description: Methodical problem-solving, continuous learning, and open source. I believe in clean code and elegant solutions.

principles.securityFirst: Security-first mindset in every development phase

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.subtitle: The technologies I master
skills.description: An overview of my technical skills, divided by area of specialization. Each skill reflects years of study, practice, and application in real projects.

items.aws: Amazon Web Services and cloud computing

experience.title: My Journey
experience.subtitle: Experience and professional growth
experience.description: A journey through my education, challenges faced, and achievements reached. Each milestone has contributed to shaping the skills I bring today.

current.title: IT Consultant - Development and Cybersecurity
current.description: Complete management of enterprise IT infrastructures and development of secure solutions for enterprise clients. Specialization in SAL, performance optimization, and critical infrastructure management.

achievements.infrastructure: Management and configuration of IT infrastructures (TrueNAS, Synology NAS, VPN) and containerized Docker solutions
achievements.security: Implementation of cybersecurity solutions, digital forensics, OSINT and infrastructure auditing with focus on vulnerabilities and patch management
achievements.development: Design and optimization of web applications with security-first approach and WordPress platform optimization for enterprise stability
achievements.clients: Services for high-profile clients: Intesa San Paolo, Fideuram, IP, Bottega Veneta

cyberchallenge.title: CyberChallenge.IT 2022
cyberchallenge.description: National cybersecurity training program for university students. Intensive training on network security, penetration testing, cryptography, and application security.

achievements.ranking: Ranking among top participants at regional level
achievements.skills: Acquired advanced skills in ethical hacking and security assessment

university.title: Computer Science
university.description: Study path focused on computer science, programming, and modern technologies. Deep dive into algorithms, data structures, and programming paradigms.

achievements.degree: Completion of study path with excellent results
achievements.projects: Implementation of complex and innovative academic projects
achievements.grades: Maintained high average and academic recognition

learning.title: Beginning of the Journey
learning.description: First steps in the programming world through online courses, tutorials, and personal projects. Building solid foundations for future tech career.

achievements.foundation: Acquisition of programming and problem-solving fundamentals

cta.title: Ready for New Challenges
cta.description: My journey has brought me here, but I'm always looking for new opportunities to grow and contribute to innovative projects.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: What I've built
projects.description: A selection of projects that best represent my technical skills and approach to problem-solving. From live projects to concepts in development.

main.title: Portfolio Web App
main.description: Professional portfolio built with Vue.js 3 and TailwindCSS 4, featuring modern design, smooth animations, and mobile-first approach. Implements web security and performance best practices.

features.security: Implementation of web security best practices
features.api: RESTful API architecture with JWT authentication

secureapi.title: Secure API Gateway
secureapi.description: API gateway with focus on security, rate limiting, and monitoring. Implements JWT, OAuth2, and advanced logging.

devopsplatform.title: DevOps Platform
devopsplatform.description: Platform for CI/CD automation with Kubernetes, monitoring, and infrastructure as code management.

cybertool.title: Cybersecurity Toolkit
cybertool.description: Suite of tools for penetration testing and vulnerability assessment, developed during CyberChallenge.

nasdesktop.title: NAS Web Platform
nasdesktop.description: Web-based multi-user platform for NAS management, similar to Nextcloud with focus on web desktop environment. Modular system with integrated apps, advanced file management, and microservices architecture.

walletwise.title: WalletWise Portfolio
walletwise.description: Personal portfolio for budget and expense management built with Vue.js, Tailwind CSS, and PrimeVue. Integrates Supabase for authentication.

passtransfer-unipi.title: PassTransfer UniPi
passtransfer-unipi.description: University system for transfer and management of University of Pisa student passes. Administrative web interface with monitoring dashboard.
